ImpDxf.videoComment: Import dxf file to CutLeader Database.

DrawBaseGeom.videoComment: Draw basic geometry, such as line, arc.

DrawStdGeom.videoComment: Draw basic geometry, such as rectangle, ellipse.

Lead.videoComment: Edit start cut point and lead in/out of the loop.

BMJ.videoComment: Edit micro joint of the loop.

Corner.videoComment: Edit the corner feature of the loop.

Condition.videoComment: Edit the cut condition of the geometry.

AutoSeq.videoComment: Generate cut sequences for all parts on sheet.

AddSeq.videoComment: Add cut sequence for the part on sheet.

ViewSeq.videoComment: Simulate the cut sequences of all parts.

GenerateNC.videoComment: Generate NC Code for all cut sequences.

CreateNestJob.videoComment: Create Nest Job to generate sheets.

AdjustNestParam.videoComment: Adjust Nest params, such as rotate angle, nest priority.

PartInPartNest.videoComment: Embed some parts within other parts during nesting.

CutFeatureRule.videoComment: The rules which will be applied when processing cut feature.

CutSeqRule.videoComment: The rules which will be applied when generating cut sequence.

NestRule.videoComment: The rules which will be applied when nesting.
